05.name: VOICE0_ADSR_1
05.description: If bit7 is set, ADSR is enabled. If cleared GAIN is used.

06.name: VOICE0_ADSR_2
06.description: These two registers control the ADSR envelope.

07.name: VOICE0_GAIN
07.description: This register provides function for software envelopes.

08.name: VOICE0_ENVX
08.description: The DSP writes the current value of the envelope to this register. (read it)

09.name: VOICE0_OUTX
09.description: The DSP writes the current waveform value after envelope multiplication and before volume multiplication.

4C.name: KON
4C.description: Key On (1 bit for each voice)

5C.name: KOF
5C.description: Key Off (1 bit for each voice)

5D.name: DIR
5D.description: Offset of source directory (DIR*100h = memory offset)

6D.name: ESA
6D.description: Echo buffer start offset (ESA*100h = memory offset)

7D.name: EDL
7D.description: Echo delay, 4-bits, higher values require more memory.
